name: Adventure of the Mystical Isles
description:
University Assignment to learn how to program within Unreal using C++ and Blueprints. Based on the Hour of Code project files on Unreal.

Explore the world by running and jumping across floating islands and platforms. Use power-ups to reach new areas or beat puzzles while collecting coins and hidden gems. Can you collect them all?

Controls

  • WASD or Controller Joystick - Move
  • Space Bar or 'A' on Controller - Jump
  • 'E' Key or 'B' on Controller - Interact when prompted
  • Alt + F4 or CMD + Q - Quit
  • Input options available in the game to set your own controls.
